item.title: Running Hugo in Docker + Traefik
item.description: This post basically highlights how you can setup your blogging site (or any static website) using Hugo running in a Docker Swarm environment with Traefik. This whole setup is done on AWS, but it could be replicated to any cloud service provider. In my case its only a single node docker swarm cluster.
